summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley expressing gratitude to a friend for their support over the past few weeks. It highlights the importance of their friendship and mentions a physicist in the family, suggesting a personal connection.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley expresses gratitude to a friend for their support and friendship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 23, 2012.
Jes Staley expresses deep gratitude for friendship.
The email mentions having a physicist in the family.
